newsitem.title: UK: ** FTSE 100 surges 1.3 percent to a record close as.
newsitem.headline: ** FTSE 100 surges 1.3 percent to a record close as.

text.p: UK's FTSE 100 hit a new milestone on Wednesday as solid corporate results and a weaker pound drew buyers back into stocks, even as the Bank of England contemplated an interest rate hike.
The key blue chip index added 65.6 points to close at 5,026.2, passing the 5,000 level for the first time.
Advancers beat decliners by a margin of two-to-one.
Dealers and strategists said expectations the BoE would raise rates at the end of its two-day meeting tomorrow had diminished.
